column4: why does my ubuntu netbook 2d session always disappears as soon as i log in?
you automatically get back to login screen?
nope.. as desktop appears , the 2d interface disappears, and turns into normal gnome desktop
check your ~/.xession-errors for unity2d errors
from the log viewer? or wherelse?
you can also paste that file to a nopaste service, like paste.ubuntu.com, then link it here for others to have a look
where can i find the log?
in your home directory, it's a hidden file starting with a dot
ok thanks ,wait
here it is http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/709501/.. :)
okay, will have a look if can find a hint in there
ok thank you very much, i'm counting on that... :D
what sessions did you select on login screen?
ubuntu netbook edition 2D
okay, thought you meant unity2d when you said 2d, can you try to re-install "netbook-launcher-efl" package?
nah.. this is 10.04, i'm always logging in to ubuntu netbook edition 2D but later these hours, it's always disappearing after the panel appears
i already reinstalled netbook-launcher-efl via synaptic.. what's next? :D
i am sorry, don't know much about that netbook edition, only see the launcher complaining about a file and a theme (try change that) complaining too
ah see,, ok thanks anyway :D
i'll try relogging
good luck! :)
